description: Display of low-level non-illuminated advertisements on hoarding fronting Bressenden Place measuring 4.6m x 2.24m and 24.6m x 2.9m and installation of non-illuminated vinyls to Portland House measuring 17.8m x 3.675m, 2.91m x 3.675m, installation of vinyls to the revolving doors measuring 0.8m x 2.37m (in four locations) and 0.94m x 2.27m (in four locations) until 31 December 2025.
